11.eng-name: The Book of the Commencement of the Prayer

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ata' bin Yasar that:He asked Zaid bin Thabit about reciting with the Imam. He said: "There is no recitation with the Imam in anything." And he claimed that he had recited: "By the star when it goes down (or vanishes)" to the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) and he did not prostrate
